word: 5. THIS BEAST HAS TWO HORNS, THE CIVIL AND THE ECCLESIASTICAL. THAT A CHURCH IS REPRESENTED BY A HORN IS PROVED IN DANIEL 7, THE "LITTLE HORN" REPRESENTING THE ROMAN CHURCH, EVEN BEFORE IT WAS POSSESSED OF CIVIL POWER. SO ALSO IN REVELATION 13. THE DRAGON (PAGAN ROME) GAVE THE BEAST (THE CHURCH) HIS POWER (CIVIL POWER), AND SEAT (CITY OF ROME), AND GREAT AUTHORITY.
